item.title: Who Works from Home after First Declaration State of Emergency?
item.description:
コロナ禍における個人と企業の変容－働き方・生活・格差と支援策（樋口美雄・労働政策研究研修機構編）, 慶應義塾大学出版会, 2021. [Book information (Japanese)]

This paper is written in Japanese. English abstract is available at our working paper version.
